headline: Goldman Sachs, Morgan Stanley, and BlackRock on Deck to Report Earnings
summary: Goldman Sachs, Morgan Stanley, and BlackRock are slated to release fourth-quarter earnings on Thursday after a tough day for investors in the financial sector.  Investors will be able to parse results from BlackRock, the world’s largest asset manager, to learn how fee growth and fund flow metrics were in the quarter, particularly across fixed-income funds.  UBS analyst Michael Brown noted in a report this week that BlackRock typically offers guidance on organic base fee growth, core expenses, its tax rate, and buybacks as part of fourth-quarter earnings.

headline: osapiens secures US$ 100 million Financing and Becomes a Unicorn with investment from BlackRock- and Temasek-founded Decarbonization Partners
summary: osapiens, a leading provider of enterprise software for sustainable growth, today announced that it had entered into an agreement for Decarbonization Partners, a joint venture between BlackRock and Temasek, to lead a US$ 100 million Series C fundraising round, subject to regulatory approvals. Decarbonization Partners will join existing investors Goldman Sachs Alternatives, which led the US$ 120 million Series B in 2024, and Armira Growth, which led the US$ 27 million Series A investment in 2023.
